channel.title: Sensor on Rapid Control Prototyping (RCP)
channel.description: Recent content in Sensor on Rapid Control Prototyping (RCP)

item.title: Air-speed sensor for plane, drone or UAVs.
item.description: Build a miniature pitot-tube with two tubes, one differential pressure sensor and one analog to digital converter integrating the signal conditioning. Calibrate air-speed measurement with a GPS ground speed reference.

item.title: Start/Stop signal for RunCam2 action cam
item.description: Signal to remotely start / stop / take a picture on a runCam2 and compatible action cam through the USB connector.
